channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 5/15/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Added detection for authorized recording devices when launching SeaX. Automatically fills in the default device when SeaX starts. Automatically sets human agent status to offline when websocket disconnects, and restores it to online upon reconnection. 5/6/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated the call logs list. Fixed an issue where empty chats were generated when creating new contacts. Resolved a memory leak issue.
